sentences.en: A good jazz soloist rephrase parts of the melody while they solo.
sentences.cn: 好的爵士独奏乐手在独奏时会改编部分旋律.

sentences.en: Again, the executive rephrased the question.
sentences.cn: 经理又重新表述了他的问题。

sentences.en: Holidays can be horrendous. All right, I'll rephrase that. The first few days are invariably hell.
sentences.cn: 假期可能会糟糕透顶。好吧，让我换一种说法。最初的几天总是如同炼狱。

sentences.en: I don't know what you mean. Please rephrase your question.
sentences.cn: 我不明白您的意思, 请重新表述一下您的问题.

sentences.en: If I can rephrase what I had just say, I thought our resource is not renewable.
sentences.cn: 如果我可以把我刚说的话重新措辞一下, 我变为我们的资源是不能再生的.

sentences.en: If I can rephrase what I have just said, I think our resource is not renewable.
sentences.cn: 如果我可以把我刚说的话重新措辞一下, 我认为我们的资源是不能再生的.

sentences.en: It is highly important that you get this point, so let me rephrase that.
sentences.cn: 这是非常重要的,你得到了这一点, 所以我想修改.

sentences.en: Let me rephrase what I just said.
sentences.cn: 让我来把我刚才说的话换个方法表达一下.

sentences.en: The problem after rephrase can say clear, and not the problem of rephrase says clear hard.
sentences.cn: 改述后的问题可以说清, 而未改述的问题则难以说清.

sentences.en: This word cannot express my idea accurately, so I'll rephrase.
sentences.cn: 这个词不能准确地表达的我的意思, 因此我要换个词来表达.

sentences.en: Would you please rephrase the question?
sentences.cn: 您能把这个问题说得简单些 吗 ?

trans.tran_en: If you rephrase a question or statement, you ask it or say it again in a different way
